poem:
Title: "From Rubble Hallways, a Dialogue"

In the backdrop of power's endless play,
Biden's words echo, make their way
down labyrinthine pathways of despair.
Each utterance a knotted snare,
Houthi whispers respond in kind,
a dialogue of the entwined.

Where upheaval is the mundane script,
lives become mere shadows, eclipsed.
Yet, hearts persist, cadence unfurls,
a wild dance in this whirling world.
